attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Given the serious nature of the allegations made in Channel 4's Dispatches of Monday 22nd March 2010 'Politicians for Hire', and in light of previous egregious actions, not least is the tearing up of The Bill of Rights 1689, it is now plain that Her Majestys' Government, in toto, is unfit to represent the people of the United Kingdom.

We respectfully petition the Prime Minister Mr Gordon Brown, firstly, to ask Her Royal Majesty Queen Elizabeth II to Dissolve Parliament, secondly, to request all Members of Parliament to present themselves at New Scotland Yard for arrest pending further Investigation, thirdly, to implement the election of a Procurator General by a popular vote.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
